column5: Enjoy lake access for water sports & fishing (bring own equipment) or relax in the backyard with views of Buchanan Lake & Dam. Fully functional home. Bedroom 1: 1 Double & 1 Queen Bed with ensuite bathroom. Bedroom 2: 1 Double with adjacent bathroom. Large living area with sofa bed and dining area. Fully equipped kitchen. Wash room. Enclosed patio.
column8: Lake front House, with water access
